alert.note: Alert for Mercer; Oliver (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 12 at 8:10AM CDT until further notice by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Bismarck ND has issued a Flood Warning for the Knife River near Hazen affecting Oliver and Mercer counties in North Dakota... ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Knife River near Hazen. * WHEN...From this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Secondary gravel roads will flood. Damage to cropland mostly south of the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 20.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this morning to a crest of 22.5 feet this afternoon. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 22.6 feet on 05/01/1975. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
